\NeedsTeXFormat{LaTeX2e}
\ProvidesFile{aisa-diagrams.tex}[2026/01/25 AISA Lubrication Diagrams]

% ============================================
% REQUIRED PACKAGES
% ============================================
\RequirePackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows.meta, shapes.geometric, shapes.misc, positioning, calc, patterns, decorations.pathmorphing}

% ============================================
% AISA COLOR PALETTE (Corporate Identity)
% ============================================
\definecolor{aisaBlue}{RGB}{0, 82, 147}       % Primary corporate blue
\definecolor{aisaGreen}{RGB}{34, 139, 34}     % Safety/OK status
\definecolor{aisaRed}{RGB}{178, 34, 34}       % Warning/Alert
\definecolor{aisaOrange}{RGB}{255, 140, 0}    % Caution
\definecolor{aisaGray}{RGB}{128, 128, 128}    % Neutral/Steel
\definecolor{aisaLightGray}{RGB}{220, 220, 220}
\definecolor{greaseBlue}{RGB}{70, 130, 180}   % Grasa Azul
\definecolor{greaseRed}{RGB}{220, 20, 60}     % Grasa Roja
\definecolor{greaseYellow}{RGB}{255, 215, 0}  % Grasa Amarilla
\definecolor{oilAmber}{RGB}{255, 191, 0}      % Aceite hidráulico

% ============================================
% TIKZ STYLES
% ============================================
\tikzset{
    % Component styles
    motor/.style={
        rectangle, draw=aisaBlue, fill=aisaLightGray,
        minimum width=2cm, minimum height=1.2cm,
        rounded corners=2pt, line width=1pt,
        font=\footnotesize\bfseries
    },
    reductor/.style={
        trapezium, trapezium left angle=70, trapezium right angle=110,
        draw=aisaBlue, fill=aisaLightGray,
        minimum width=1.5cm, minimum height=1cm,
        line width=1pt, font=\footnotesize
    },
    bearing/.style={
        circle, draw=aisaBlue, fill=white,
        minimum size=0.6cm, line width=1.5pt
    },
    grease-point/.style={
        circle, draw=greaseBlue, fill=greaseBlue!30,
        minimum size=0.4cm, line width=1pt
    },
    grease-point-red/.style={
        circle, draw=greaseRed, fill=greaseRed!30,
        minimum size=0.4cm, line width=1pt
    },
    oil-point/.style={
        diamond, draw=oilAmber, fill=oilAmber!30,
        minimum size=0.4cm, line width=1pt
    },
    roller/.style={
        rectangle, draw=aisaGray, fill=aisaGray!40,
        minimum width=0.4cm, minimum height=1cm,
        rounded corners=0.2cm, line width=1pt
    },
    shaft/.style={
        rectangle, draw=aisaBlue, fill=aisaGray!20,
        minimum height=0.15cm, line width=1pt
    },
    chain/.style={
        decorate, decoration={snake, amplitude=0.5mm, segment length=3mm},
        draw=aisaGray, line width=2pt
    },
    hydraulic-line/.style={
        draw=aisaBlue, line width=2pt, dashed
    },
    conveyor/.style={
        rectangle, draw=aisaGray, fill=aisaGray!20,
        minimum height=0.3cm, line width=1pt, rounded corners=1pt
    },
    saw-blade/.style={
        circle, draw=aisaGray, fill=white,
        minimum size=1.2cm, line width=2pt,
        postaction={decorate, decoration={
            markings,
            mark=between positions 0 and 1 step 0.1 with {
                \draw[line width=0.5pt] (0, 0.6cm) -- (0, 0.7cm);
            }
        }}
    },
    % Label styles
    component-label/.style={
        font=\scriptsize, text=aisaBlue
    },
    point-label/.style={
        font=\tiny\bfseries, text=black
    },
    frequency-label/.style={
        font=\tiny, text=aisaGray, align=center
    },
    % Arrow styles
    flow-arrow/.style={
        -{Stealth[length=2mm]}, line width=1pt, draw=aisaBlue
    },
    lubricant-flow/.style={
        -{Stealth[length=2mm]}, line width=1.5pt, draw=greaseBlue, dashed
    }
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.1: CANTER TRANSMISSION (DRIVE SHAFT)
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramCanterTransmission}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.85, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (4, 4.5) {Plano de Transmisión -- Canter 240-12E};
    
    % Main motor
    \node[motor] (motor) at (0, 2) {MOTOR};
    
    % Drive pulley (A)
    \node[bearing, label={[point-label]above:A}] (pulleyA) at (2, 2) {};
    \node[component-label, below=0.1cm of pulleyA] {Polea Trans.};
    \node[grease-point] at (2, 2.6) {};
    
    % Splined shaft (B)
    \draw[shaft, minimum width=2cm] (2.5, 1.95) rectangle (4.5, 2.05);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:B}] at (3.5, 2.3) {};
    \node[component-label] at (3.5, 1.6) {Eje Estriado};
    
    % Toothed pulley (C)
    \node[bearing, minimum size=0.8cm, label={[point-label]above:C}] (pulleyC) at (5.5, 2) {};
    \node[component-label, below=0.1cm of pulleyC] {Polea Dentada};
    \node[grease-point] at (5.5, 2.6) {};
    
    % Tensioner pulley (D)
    \node[bearing, minimum size=0.5cm, label={[point-label]right:D}] (pulleyD) at (7, 3) {};
    \node[component-label, above=0.1cm of pulleyD] {Polea Tensora};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.5, 3) {};
    
    % Belt representation
    \draw[line width=2pt, aisaGray] (2.3, 2.3) -- (5.2, 2.3) -- (6.7, 2.8) -- (7, 3);
    \draw[line width=2pt, aisaGray] (2.3, 1.7) -- (5.2, 1.7);
    
    % Output shaft
    \draw[shaft, minimum width=1.5cm] (6, 1.95) rectangle (8, 2.05);
    \node[component-label] at (7, 1.5) {Salida a Canter};
    
    % Legend
    \draw[greaseBlue, fill=greaseBlue!30, line width=1pt] (0.2, 0.3) circle (0.15);
    \node[font=\tiny, right] at (0.5, 0.3) {Punto de engrase (Grasa I y II)};
    
    % Frequency notes
    \node[frequency-label, anchor=west] at (0, -0.3) {A, C, D: Mensual | B: Cada 8 hrs};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.2: VERTICAL FEED ROLLERS
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramVerticalFeedRollers}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.85, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (4, 5) {Rodillos de Avance Verticales -- Canter 240-12E};
    
    % Gearbox (A)
    \node[reductor, label={[point-label]left:A}] (gearbox1) at (0, 3.5) {};
    \node[reductor, label={[point-label]left:A}] (gearbox2) at (0, 1.5) {};
    \node[component-label, left=0.3cm of gearbox1] {Reductor};
    \node[oil-point] at (0.3, 3.8) {};
    \node[oil-point] at (0.3, 1.8) {};
    
    % Cardan shafts (B)
    \draw[shaft, minimum width=2.5cm] (0.8, 3.45) rectangle (3.3, 3.55);
    \draw[shaft, minimum width=2.5cm] (0.8, 1.45) rectangle (3.3, 1.55);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:B}] at (2, 3.8) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (2, 1.8) {};
    \node[component-label] at (2, 3) {Cardan};
    
    % Roller axis (C)
    \draw[shaft, minimum width=0.8cm, rotate=90] (3.5, -4) rectangle (4.3, -3.5);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]right:C}] at (4.2, 2.5) {};
    \node[component-label, right] at (4.5, 2.5) {Eje Rodillos};
    
    % Rollers
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.5cm] (roller1) at (4, 4) {};
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.5cm] (roller2) at (4, 1) {};
    
    % Roller bearings (D)
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]right:D}] at (4.4, 4.3) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (4.4, 3.7) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (4.4, 1.3) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (4.4, 0.7) {};
    
    % Wood flow direction
    \draw[flow-arrow, aisaGreen] (5.5, 2.5) -- (7, 2.5);
    \node[component-label, text=aisaGreen] at (6.25, 3) {Flujo Madera};
    
    % Legend
    \draw[greaseBlue, fill=greaseBlue!30] (0, -0.5) circle (0.15);
    \node[font=\tiny, right] at (0.3, -0.5) {Grasa I y II};
    \draw[oilAmber, fill=oilAmber!30] (3, -0.5) -- (3.15, -0.35) -- (3.3, -0.5) -- (3.15, -0.65) -- cycle;
    \node[font=\tiny, right] at (3.5, -0.5) {Aceite 150 (7000 hrs)};
    
    % Frequencies
    \node[frequency-label, anchor=west] at (0, -1) {A: 7000 hrs | B, C, D: Cada 40 hrs};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.3: PERFILADORA LINCK TOP VIEW
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramPerfiladoraTopView}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.75, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (5, 6) {Vista Superior -- Perfiladora LINCK (VPS-00-003E)};
    
    % Machine frame
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=2pt, rounded corners=5pt] (0, 0) rectangle (10, 5);
    
    % Entry zone
    \draw[aisaGray, fill=aisaLightGray] (0.5, 1.5) rectangle (2, 3.5);
    \node[component-label, rotate=90] at (1.25, 2.5) {ENTRADA};
    
    % Profiler saws
    \foreach \y in {1.8, 2.5, 3.2} {
        \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt] (3, \y) circle (0.3);
        \node[grease-point, minimum size=0.2cm] at (3.4, \y + 0.2) {};
    }
    \node[component-label] at (3, 0.8) {Sierras};
    
    % Guide rails (10)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=1.5pt] (4, 1.2) -- (7, 1.2);
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=1.5pt] (4, 3.8) -- (7, 3.8);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:10}] at (4.5, 4) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (5.5, 4) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.5, 4) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (4.5, 1) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (5.5, 1) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.5, 1) {};
    \node[component-label] at (5.5, 4.5) {Guías Lineales BV/HV};
    
    % Ball screws (11)
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=2pt, decorate, decoration={coil, aspect=0}] (5, 2) -- (5, 3);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]left:11}] at (4.7, 2.5) {};
    \node[component-label, right] at (5.3, 2.5) {Husillo Bolas};
    
    % Exit zone
    \draw[aisaGray, fill=aisaLightGray] (8, 1.5) rectangle (9.5, 3.5);
    \node[component-label, rotate=90] at (8.75, 2.5) {SALIDA};
    
    % Flow direction
    \draw[flow-arrow, aisaGreen] (0, 2.5) -- (-0.5, 2.5);
    \draw[flow-arrow, aisaGreen] (10.5, 2.5) -- (10, 2.5);
    
    % Frequency legend
    \node[frequency-label] at (5, -0.5) {N°10: 8 hrs (16 pts) | N°11: 160 hrs (6 pts)};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.5/9.6: WD H84 FEED ROLLERS
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramWDFeedRollers}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.85, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (4, 5.5) {Rodillos de Avance H84 -- Wuster Decker};
    
    % Frame
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt] (0, 0) rectangle (8, 5);
    
    % Upper rollers
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.8cm] (upperL) at (2, 4) {};
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.8cm] (upperR) at (6, 4) {};
    
    % Lower rollers
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.8cm] (lowerL) at (2, 1) {};
    \node[roller, minimum height=1.8cm] (lowerR) at (6, 1) {};
    
    % Bearings and grease points (1, 2)
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]left:1}] at (1.6, 4.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (1.6, 3.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.4, 4.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.4, 3.5) {};
    
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]left:2}] at (1.6, 1.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (1.6, 0.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.4, 1.5) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (6.4, 0.5) {};
    
    % Wood guide adjustment (3)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=1pt] (3.5, 4.8) -- (4.5, 4.8);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:3}] at (4, 4.8) {};
    \node[component-label] at (4, 5.2) {Husillo Guía};
    
    % Wood passage
    \draw[aisaGreen, fill=aisaGreen!20, rounded corners=2pt] (3, 2) rectangle (5, 3);
    \node[font=\tiny, text=aisaGreen] at (4, 2.5) {MADERA};
    
    % Legend
    \node[frequency-label] at (4, -0.5) {1, 2: Cada 3 meses | 3: Cada 6 meses};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.7: FR10 CYLINDERS AND STIRRUPS
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramFRCylinders}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.8, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (4.5, 6) {Cilindros y Estribos FR10};
    
    % Frame
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1.5pt] (0, 0) rectangle (9, 5.5);
    
    % Extraction side
    \node[font=\footnotesize\bfseries, text=aisaBlue] at (2.5, 5) {EXTRACCIÓN};
    
    % Upper cylinder (3)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=2pt] (1, 4) -- (4, 4);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:3}] at (1.5, 4.3) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (3.5, 4.3) {};
    
    % Lower cylinder (1)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=2pt] (1, 1.5) -- (4, 1.5);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]below:1}] at (1.5, 1.2) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (3.5, 1.2) {};
    
    % Stirrup bearings (2)
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, fill=aisaLightGray] (0.8, 2.5) rectangle (1.2, 3.5);
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, fill=aisaLightGray] (3.8, 2.5) rectangle (4.2, 3.5);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]left:2}] at (0.6, 3) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (4.4, 3) {};
    
    % Introduction side
    \node[font=\footnotesize\bfseries, text=aisaBlue] at (6.5, 5) {INTRODUCCIÓN};
    
    % Upper cylinder (5)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=2pt] (5, 4) -- (8, 4);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]above:5}] at (5.5, 4.3) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (7.5, 4.3) {};
    
    % Lower cylinder (7)
    \draw[aisaBlue, line width=2pt] (5, 1.5) -- (8, 1.5);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]below:7}] at (5.5, 1.2) {};
    \node[grease-point] at (7.5, 1.2) {};
    
    % Stirrup bearings (6)
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, fill=aisaLightGray] (4.8, 2.5) rectangle (5.2, 3.5);
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, fill=aisaLightGray] (7.8, 2.5) rectangle (8.2, 3.5);
    \node[grease-point, label={[point-label]right:6}] at (8.4, 3) {};
    
    % Door hinge (4)
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt] (4.5, 0.5) circle (0.3);
    \node[grease-point-red, label={[point-label]below:4}] at (4.5, 0.1) {};
    \node[component-label] at (4.5, -0.5) {Bisagra (Anual)};
    
    % Legend
    \node[frequency-label] at (4.5, -1) {1, 3, 5, 7: 3 meses | 2, 6, 8: 6 meses | 4: Anual};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% FIGURE 9.12: SAW ARBOR DETAIL (NBU 15)
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramSawArbor}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries\small, text=aisaBlue] at (4, 4.5) {Detalle Árbol de Sierra -- Grasa ISOFLEX NBU 15};
    
    % Warning box
    \draw[aisaRed, line width=2pt, fill=aisaRed!10, rounded corners=3pt] (0, 3.5) rectangle (8, 4.2);
    \node[font=\footnotesize\bfseries, text=aisaRed] at (4, 3.85) {ATENCION: USAR SOLAMENTE GRASA ISOFLEX NBU 15};
    
    % Shaft cross-section
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=2pt, fill=aisaLightGray] (1, 1) rectangle (7, 2.5);
    
    % Interior bearing (A)
    \draw[bearing, minimum size=0.8cm] (2, 1.75) circle (0.4);
    \node[grease-point-red, label={[point-label]above:A}] at (2, 2.3) {};
    \node[component-label] at (2, 0.5) {Coj. Interior};
    \node[frequency-label] at (2, 0) {Anual (10 gr)};
    
    % Exterior bearing (B)
    \draw[bearing, minimum size=0.8cm] (6, 1.75) circle (0.4);
    \node[grease-point-red, label={[point-label]above:B}] at (6, 2.3) {};
    \node[component-label] at (6, 0.5) {Coj. Exterior};
    \node[frequency-label] at (6, 0) {Anual (8 gr)};
    
    % Labyrinth seal (C)
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, decorate, decoration={zigzag, amplitude=1mm, segment length=2mm}] (3.5, 1) -- (3.5, 2.5);
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=1pt, decorate, decoration={zigzag, amplitude=1mm, segment length=2mm}] (4.5, 1) -- (4.5, 2.5);
    \node[grease-point-red, label={[point-label]above:C}] at (4, 2.6) {};
    \node[component-label] at (4, 0.5) {Empaq. Laberíntica};
    \node[frequency-label] at (4, 0) {Semestral (4 gr)};
    
    % Saw blade representation
    \draw[aisaGray, line width=2pt] (7.3, 1.75) circle (0.8);
    \node[component-label] at (7.3, 0.5) {Sierra};
    
    % Legend
    \draw[greaseRed, fill=greaseRed!30, line width=1pt] (0.5, -0.8) circle (0.15);
    \node[font=\tiny, right] at (0.8, -0.8) {ISOFLEX NBU 15 -- Mantener boquilla limpia};
\end{tikzpicture}
}

% ============================================
% SUMMARY TABLE DIAGRAM
% ============================================
\newcommand{\diagramFrequencySummary}{%
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.7, transform shape]
    % Title
    \node[font=\bfseries, text=aisaBlue] at (6, 8) {Resumen de Frecuencias de Lubricación};
    
    % Daily
    \draw[aisaGreen, fill=aisaGreen!20, rounded corners=3pt] (0, 6) rectangle (4, 7.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (2, 7) {DIARIAS};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (2, 6.4) {Centrales hid., Engrasado, Cadenas};
    
    % Every other day
    \draw[aisaBlue, fill=aisaBlue!20, rounded corners=3pt] (4.5, 6) rectangle (8.5, 7.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (6.5, 7) {DÍA POR MEDIO};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (6.5, 6.4) {VQT, FR-10 Bijur};
    
    % Weekly
    \draw[aisaOrange, fill=aisaOrange!20, rounded corners=3pt] (9, 6) rectangle (12, 7.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (10.5, 7) {SEMANALES};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (10.5, 6.4) {Perfiladora (X), WD (J)};
    
    % Biweekly
    \draw[aisaRed, fill=aisaRed!20, rounded corners=3pt] (0, 4) rectangle (4, 5.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (2, 5) {QUINCENALES};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (2, 4.4) {Harneros, GRIMME, Rotores (Sáb)};
    
    % Monthly
    \draw[aisaGray, fill=aisaGray!20, rounded corners=3pt] (4.5, 4) rectangle (8.5, 5.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (6.5, 5) {MENSUALES};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (6.5, 4.4) {Reductores, Rodamientos};
    
    % Quarterly/Annual
    \draw[black, fill=black!10, rounded corners=3pt] (9, 4) rectangle (12, 5.5);
    \node[font=\small\bfseries] at (10.5, 5) {TRIM./ANUAL};
    \node[font=\tiny, align=left] at (10.5, 4.4) {Árbol sierra (NBU 15)};
\end{tikzpicture}
}
